General.Name: Zhejiang Windey Co Ltd
General.Description: Zhejiang Windey Co., Ltd. develops, manufactures, and sells wind turbines in China. It also invests in and operates new energy power station projects, as well as provides smart services. In addition, the company offers EPC general contracting services, grid-connected products and services, and new energy digital products. The company was incorporated in 2001 and is headquartered in Hangzhou, China.
General.Address: West Lake International Sci & Tech Bldg, Hangzhou, China, 310012
